name: Colziand
startIntroPart1: Oh Raymond! You who formed a nation of people for God to saved, glorious you are. Thanks be to the mighty Father.
startIntroPart2: Will you once more rule the world for the Lord's desire.
attacked: I'm dissapointed! Why declare destruction, is there no fun in peace and prosperity?
defeated: Colziand is its people, me, and Him.
introduction: Kumusta sa'inyo. O estranghero, saan ka galing?
hateHello: You speak in pride, I don't wanna hear it
tradeRequest: It appears that you have a golden interest of our goods
uniques: Starts with [Electronics]
[+20]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities]
[-50]% City-State Influence degradation
City-State Influence recovers at twice the normal rate
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
[+1 Production] from every [Strategic resource]
Double quantity of [Horses] produced
Double quantity of [Iron] produced
Double quantity of [Uranium] produced
[+1] Sight <for [{Military} {Land}] units>
[-50]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]
[+50]% Golden Age length
[+1] Movement <for [All] units> <during a Golden Age>
[+10]% Strength <for [All] units> <during a Golden Age>
Enables embarkation for land units <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Normal vision when embarked <for [All] units>
[+10]% Strength <within [2] tiles of a [Moai]>
[+50]% [Food] from City-States
[+50]% [Culture] from City-States
[+50]% [Faith] from City-States
Military Units gifted from City-States start with [+70] XP
[+1] Movement <for [Embarked] units>
[1] Movement point cost to disembark <for [All] units>
No movement cost to pillage <for [Melee] units>

name: Fullysia
startIntroPart1: Feared woman with the strength like men. You Ullysia from Colziand is fierce in battles but at what cost? You do it so that it will end, war destroys each other but peace helps each other.
startIntroPart2: See? War will once more wage, do what must be done.
declaringWar: Prepare! My people are skilled for this terrains.
attacked: You see. Your land will be covered in nature because we will ruin it.
defeated: Raze, puppet or annex? We will be liberated.
introduction: Salutations, I wanna know your kingdom too?
hateHello: No, I don't wanna hear it.?
afterPeace: From Colziand we voyage to new land, better leave us.
uniques: Starts with [Railroads]
[+2 Culture] [in all cities] <before discovering [Steam Power]>
Great General provides double combat bonus
[Great General] is earned [50]% faster
[+25]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital
Damage is ignored when determining unit Strength <for [non-air] units>
Unhappiness from number of Cities doubled
[-50]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities]
All units move through Forest and Jungle Tiles in friendly territory as if they have roads. These tiles can be used to establish City Connections upon researching the Wheel.
Receive triple Gold from Barbarian encampments and pillaging Cities
Defense bonus when embarked <for [All] units>
+30% Strength when fighting City-State units and cities
[+1] Movement <for [Mounted] units>
Earn [100]% of killed [Military] unit's [Strength] as [Culture]

name: Suzainswellia
startIntroPart1: Grand governor of the suzerain Colziand. We are honored of your presence and the leader is please to meet you again since college.
startIntroPart2: Dear queen of Colziand, we are in no position to ask you but guide us.
declaringWar: Our ships will end this wages of sin!
attacked: I want you see now that your land will be sunk by our waves of attacks.
introduction: Waves as high as heavens I introduce you to our home.
hateHello: My the wrath of God bash waves at your cities and flood your lands?
afterPeace: Hey, no hard feelings. Let's not bother each other again.
uniques: Starts with [Astronomy]
[+2] Movement <for [Water] units>
Receive free [Great Scientist] when you discover [Writing]
[Great Scientist] is earned [50]% faster
[+1 Gold] from each Trade Route
Double quantity of [Oil] produced
[-66]% maintenance costs <for [Water] units>
When defeating a [{Barbarian} {Water}] unit, earn [25] Gold and recruit it <with [50]% chance>
[+2 Science] from every specialist [in all cities]
[+2 Science] from every [Great Improvement]
Receive a tech boost when scientific buildings/wonders are built in capital
100 Gold for discovering a Natural Wonder (bonus enhanced to 500 Gold if first to discover it)
Double Happiness from Natural Wonders
Tile yields from Natural Wonders doubled
Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills
[-50]% maintenance on road & railroads
No Maintenance costs for improvements in [Hill] tiles

name: Leono
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: What a fine battle! Leono is willing to serve you!

name: Saludonia
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: You fiend! History shall remember this!

declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: They will write songs of this.... pray that they shall be in your favor.

name: Sabert Zhang
declaringWar: You have revealed your purposes a bit too early, my friend...

defeated: A wrong calculation, on my part.
